document_data.name: Battle Trident
document_data.mainbody: '''''Battle trident''''' was an improved version of the [[evocation]] spell, ''[[speeding trident]]''.
document_data.Effects: This spell worked similarly to ''speeding trident'', except that the projectile twisted and streaked towards its target. For its brief existence, the ''battle trident'' functioned as if it possessed a ''+2 [[Item enchantment|enchantment]]''.
document_data.History: The name of this spell appeared on the surface of the [[Umberlant]] [[relic]], the ''[[Orglara]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required three drops of water and three points made of ferrous metal as [[material component]]s.
